title: 51.Inner Child Healing with Alyssa Lia Mancao
description:
Hey girl!

In this episode, we have a special guest, licensed psychotherapist Alyssa Lia Mancao. During this episode, Alyssa and I chat about inner child healing work, trauma, and how to deal with it all especially, during the quarantine. You are not going to want to miss the gems she drops in this episode!

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Click here to order your copy of the Inner Child Healing Affirmations and Guided Meditations combo pack

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com

Special guest: Alyssa Lia Mancao, licensed psychotherapist
 
Alyssa's IG: @alyssamariewellness
 
Alyssa's email: info@alyssamariewellness.com
